name: Thin Atmosphere
desc: $market atmosphere is several psi lower than the one found on earth, this does make the planet more accessible due to ship being able to enter orbit much closer to the surface. this does have some unwanted consequance too, spacer tend to prefer settling more habitable planet and the one that do tend to be more stressed has a result of the constent stress that there habitat could  kill them if the pressure in them drop. the maintenance of the many decompression chamber does also make $market require more steel and heavy machinery (+1) but does make ore extraction much simpler has there is barely any risk for fire to start.
